PHRASE.LANG: Your cavities will thank you for surrounding them with furniture as sweet as this. Bundle includes a chair, sofa, table, rug, lamp, and giant ice cream cone. [#Legal]
Attention aux caries avec cet ensemble de meubles confiseries. Ce pack comprend une chaise, un canapé, une table, un tapis, une lampe et un cornet de glace géant. [#Legal]

Alle Löcher in den Zähnen bedanken sich, wenn man sich mit diesen süßen Möbeln umgibt. Im Paket enthalten sind ein Stuhl, ein Sofa, ein Tisch, ein Vorleger, eine Lampe und eine riesige Eiswaffel. [#Legal]
Le tue carie ti ringrazieranno per tutta questa dolcezza. Il pacchetto include poltrona, divano, tavolo, tappetino, lampada e cono gelato gigante. [#Legal]
Tus caries te agradecerán que te rodees de tan dulce mobiliario. El conjunto comprende silla, sofá, mesa, alfombra, lámpara y cono de helado gigante. [#Legal]
이렇게 달콤한 가구들로 집을 장식한다면, 당신의 미각은 분명 감사한 마음을 가질 겁니다. 이 세트는 의자, 소파, 탁자, 액자, 양탄자, 램프, 그리고 거대한 아이스크림 콘을 포함합니다. [#Legal]
Your cavities will thank you for surrounding them with furniture as sweet as this. Bundle includes a chair, sofa, table, picture frame, rug, lamp, and giant ice cream cone. [#Legal]
你的蛀牙會感謝你用這麼甜美的家具包圍它們。本組合包括椅子、沙發、桌子、相架、小地毯、電燈及巨型雪糕筒。[#Legal]
你的蛀牙會感謝你用這麼甜美的家具包圍它們。本組合包括椅子、沙發、桌子、相框、小地毯、電燈及巨型雪糕筒。[#Legal]
Your cavities will thank you for surrounding them with furniture as sweet as this. Bundle includes a chair, sofa, table, picture frame, rug, lamp, and giant ice cream cone. [#Legal]
